verbs.description: another suspicious package to [V: cnn] [ARG1: brings count to] 15 cnn was the intended recipient of a third suspicious package this one intercepted in atlanta on monday morning the fbi and atlanta police were called to a post office some 1 2 miles from cnn headquarters around 9 30am the fbi confirmed what they recovered is similar in appearance to cnn center cesar sayoc cnn atlanta fbi federal bureau of investigation
